Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Able to simplify complicated concepts on a graduate level course, when teachers might speak more complex or skip over things

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: going back and forth, AI felt weirdly more personal, as it could have longer and more in depth conversations than a lecturer with 100s of students

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teacher's feedback was more in line with the course and the assignment, whereas AI feedback more in line with writing, structure, and ideas. Can fix this by inputting more of the criteria in, but never perfect
